text:
@WhiteHouse Trump, on 5/8/20 their will be 80,000 coronavirus deaths all because of you, the actual number is at least 2 times higher.  Because of lies and mismanagement the death toll is so high, the highest in the world by far.  This is inexcusable and preventable
#TrumpLiesPeopleDie
